metadata.title: CVE-2024-44998 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:atm: idt77252: prevent use after free in dequeue_rx()We can't dereference "skb" after calling vcc->push() because the skbis released.

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
